Consider a domain where only the following relations can exist between any two entities:

{{has population}}
{{headquarters}}
{{has type}}
{{has education}}
{{has occupation}}
{{has genre}}
{{from country}}
{{event year}}
{{no relation}}

Given the following examples,

Statement: {{Fieldfisher LLP is a European law firm headquartered in London, United Kingdom.}}
{{headquarters}} best describes the relation between {{Fieldfisher}} and {{London}}

Statement: {{Tony Ricciardello, (born 19 March 1979), is a multiple-championship winning Australian race car driver.}}
{{from country}} best describes the relation between {{Tony Ricciardello}} and {{Australia}}

Statement: {{Viaggio Air (VM) was a private airline based and registered in Sofia, Bulgaria in September 2002.}}
{{headquarters}} best describes the relation between {{Viaggio Air}} and {{Sofia}}

Statement: {{PCH Games (formerly Candystand.com) is a casual game portal owned by Publishers Clearing House and based in New York City.}}
{{headquarters}} best describes the relation between {{PCH Games}} and {{New York City}}

Statement: {{Eskimo Snow is the third studio album by American band Why?.}}
{{has type}} best describes the relation between {{Eskimo Snow}} and {{studio album}}



Утверждение: {{Паоло Моджо () — лондонский диджей и продюсер, выпускающий и играющий музыку в стиле хаус, тек-хаус, техно, электро и диско.}}


Какое отношение лучше всего описывает отношение между {{Паоло Моджо}} и {{техно}} из списка отношений, указанных выше?
